feed.title: KrakenD Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for KrakenD: v2.6.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: typo by @testwill in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/880
  • deps: uplift go to 1.22.3 by @ALX99 in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/881
  • release v2.6.3 by @kpacha in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/883

New Contributors

  • @testwill made their first contribution in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/880

Full Changelog: https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/compare/v2.6.2...v2.6.3

entry.title: New release for KrakenD: v2.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update Go and Alpine versions by @arambau-wgfs in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/888
  • Bump github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-go/sdk/azidentity from 1.5.1 to 1.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/887
  • always stack the cache factory on the backend by @kpacha in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/891
  • Update deps for 2 7 by @dhontecillas in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/894
  • Bump github.com/hashicorp/go-retryablehttp from 0.7.5 to 0.7.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/893
  • set DNS Cache TTL time on startup by @dhontecillas in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/904
  • Add permissions to upload the security reports by @taik0 in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/905
  • Deps 2 7 updated libs by @dhontecillas in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/906
  • Release v2.7.0 by @kpacha in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/902

Full Changelog: https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/compare/v2.6.3...v2.7.0

entry.title: New release for KrakenD: v2.7.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Updated the JOSE library to unflag the vulnerability CVE-2024-28180 from scanner, even it does not affect KrakenD.
  • The gocloud library has been updated to a higher version (includes minor security fixes for PubSub, Secrets, Azure and AWS
  • OpenTelemetry libraries updated
  • Go language updated
  • The check plugin command printed unnecessarily the help command
  • Prevent a failing Identity Provider to be queried constantly by introducing the property failed_jwk_key_cooldown
  • OpenAPI was generating incorrect URL patterns with placeholders by decoding its special chars
  • OpenAPI did not accept keys with dots in the schemas
  • OpenAPI did not have dynamic routing into account and required to manually declare input_headers and input_query_strings, which are now automatic
  • Tiered rate limit durations were incorrectly parsed
  • Inheritance in the extended flexible configuration didn't allow special chars
  • Make the KrakenD main module version detectable by Syft by @LaurentGoderre in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/912

New Contributors

  • @LaurentGoderre made their first contribution in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/912

Full Changelog: https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/compare/v2.7.0...v2.7.1

entry.title: New release for KrakenD: v2.7.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • lua pkg upgraded to v2.1.3 by @kpacha in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/926

Full Changelog: https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/compare/v2.7.1...v2.7.2
